name: Triathon
description: Triathon is an decentralized AI model training platform in the Web3 space with a focus on security. We've launched a series of smart contract security detection products based on AI model applications. Triathon is a decentralized testing/launching platform for smart contracts and Web 2.0 micro-services, reducing reliance on centralized auditing or software security services. The team is committed to advancing the decentralized AI and making it more accessible to everyone.
